title: The Frank Sinatra Timex show
brief_description: A television variety show hosted by Frank Sinatra with special guests Dean Martin, Bing Crosby, Mitzi Gaynor and Jimmy Durante. An entertaining program with lots of music, dance and witty conversation and featuring some of Sinatra’s all-time favourites. Music direction by Nelson Riddle.
